title: My Ass Just Got Kicked
body: Recent ranked games I fed. RiP hot weather and basically, I'm on an 8 losing spree on Ranked. Dropped from 94 LP to 0.

replies.body: I'm not playing Ranked for the rest of the pre-season :P

I find I can do fine in B5-B3, but once I hit B2 basically it comes down to the winning team having less %%%%wits.

So many delicate flowers here. Had one Vi rage at team because we asked her to get tank items.

So she bought runaans and died in every team fight before ult completed.

Great days.
Yes I do. People need to know the pain.
You don't have to post it on forums and boards Phantom xd
